CustomField.formula: TEXT(TotalLogEntries__c) + ' total entries' + IF( TotalLogEntriesWithERRORLoggingLevel__c = 0, '', ', ' + TEXT(TotalLogEntriesWithERRORLoggingLevel__c) + ' error(s)' ) + IF( TotalLogEntriesWithWARNLoggingLevel__c = 0, '', ', ' + TEXT(TotalLogEntriesWithWARNLoggingLevel__c) + ' warning(s)' )
CustomField.label: Summary
